description: The ancient bear, unearthed by reindeer herders, has been hailed as a find of "great importance".
title: Bear from Ice Age found 'completely preserved' in Russian Arctic
title_page: Bear from Ice Age found 'completely preserved' in Russian Arctic - BBC News
maintext: The bear carcass was found by reindeer herders on Bolshoy Lyakhovsky Island, the largest of the Lyakhovsky Islands, which are part of the New Siberian Islands archipelago that lies between the Laptev Sea and the East Siberian Sea.
